rooms.description: Spacious living area with colonial style decor, featuring a focal fireplace and ample seating. Large windows placed in the east for Vastu compliance ensuring positive energy.
Formal dining area adjacent to the living room. Colonial style wooden table and chairs with elegant colonial detailing.
Functional kitchen designed in a colonial style with modern amenities and open layout. Includes counter space and storage aligned with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Compact living area for the servants designed with basic colonial charm and functional layout.
Essential bathroom placed near the kitchen for efficient service access. Colonial style fixtures and simple design.
Storage/utility space adjacent to the kitchen for additional storage aligned with colonial aesthetics and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing the north to welcome positive energy as per Vastu. Designed in colonial style with wood detailing.
Service entrance to the servant's quarters, ensuring privacy and ease of movement.
Small balcony off the living room for relaxation and enjoying a colonial courtyard.

rooms.description: Elegant master bedroom with colonial detailing. Features a king-size bed and ample storage. Placed in the southwestern corner to promote stability according to Vastu.
Additional bedroom with colonial style decor for guests or family. Placed adjacent to the master bedroom ensuring privacy.
Bathroom attached to the master bedroom with colonial fixtures and modern plumbing.
Bathroom attached to the guest bedroom for convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Sturdy staircase with colonial balustrades connecting the ground floor to the first floor. Positioned centrally for ease of access.

rooms.description: Cozy study space with colonial aesthetics. Placed in the northeastern corner to promote knowledge and creativity as per Vastu.
Additional storage closet integrated into the design to optimize space utilization.

openings.description: Access point to the roof for ventilation and maintenance.
